subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “(Internet slang) to delete, block or censor”
: From {{w|Moha culture}} where {{zh-l|續}} means “to extend Jiang Zemin's life by a certain amount of time by taking it from one's own > to take away someone's lifespan and add it to Jiang's”, from {{zh-l|續命|to prolong or extend one's life}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[continue]]; to [[carry on]]
# to [[succeed]]
# {{lb|zh|internet slang}} to [[delete]], [[block]] or [[censor]]
